jirleech wrote:

> I have an odd syntax error in Eclipse with any files that contain the
> assert keyword.  Anyone else notice this, is there a special
> workaround?  Thanks

The assert keyword was introduced in JDK 1.4, but Eclipse 2.x defaults
to 1.3 behavior. To change, go to...

     Window>Preferences>Java>Compiler>Compliance and Classfiles

... and set the compiler compliance level to 1.4.

- Gordon @ IA
